vulnerability_findings.name: inefficient-state-variable-increment
vulnerability_findings.message: <x> += <y> costs more gas than <x> = <x> + <y> for state variables.

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: constructor(uint256 rate, address wallet, IERC20 token) internal {
vulnerability_findings.message:
Crowdsale.constructor.rate (local variable @ IncreasingPriceCrowdsaleImpl.sol#276) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.rate (function @ IncreasingPriceCrowdsaleImpl.sol#317-320)

	- Crowdsale.wallet (function @ IncreasingPriceCrowdsaleImpl.sol#310-313)

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.constructor (IncreasingPriceCrowdsaleImpl.sol#486-494) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(openingTime >= block.timestamp) (IncreasingPriceCrowdsaleImpl.sol#488)

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.isOpen (IncreasingPriceCrowdsaleImpl.sol#512-516) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= _openingTime && block.timestamp <= _closingTime (IncreasingPriceCrowdsaleImpl.sol#514)

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (IncreasingPriceCrowdsaleImpl.sol#521-525) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > _closingTime (IncreasingPriceCrowdsaleImpl.sol#523)

vulnerability_findings.message: Function 'Crowdsale._preValidatePurchase' (IncreasingPriceCrowdsaleImpl.sol#371-381) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Function 'Crowdsale._postValidatePurchase' (IncreasingPriceCrowdsaleImpl.sol#387-396) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.message: Function 'Crowdsale._processPurchase' (IncreasingPriceCrowdsaleImpl.sol#416-424) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.message: Function 'Crowdsale._updatePurchasingState' (IncreasingPriceCrowdsaleImpl.sol#430-438) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.message: Function 'Crowdsale._getTokenAmount' (IncreasingPriceCrowdsaleImpl.sol#444-449) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Function 'Crowdsale._forwardFunds' (IncreasingPriceCrowdsaleImpl.sol#453-456) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Function 'TimedCrowdsale._preValidatePurchase' (IncreasingPriceCrowdsaleImpl.sol#531-541) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Function 'IncreasingPriceCrowdsale._getTokenAmount' (IncreasingPriceCrowdsaleImpl.sol#617-623) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: Dependence on predictable environment variable (SWC 116)
vulnerability_findings.message:
A control flow decision is made based on The block.timestamp environment variable.
The block.timestamp environment variable is used to determine a control flow decision. Note that the values of variables like coinbase, gaslimit, block number and timestamp are predictable and can be manipulated by a malicious miner. Also keep in mind that attackers know hashes of earlier blocks. Don't use any of those environment variables as sources of randomness and be aware that use of these variables introduces a certain level of trust into miners.
Classification: SWC-116
